name: places/ChIJE3SO9C5ZwokRrA04gkUVIyQ
formattedAddress: 135 E 50th St, New York, NY 10022, USA
adrFormatAddress: 135 E 50th St, New York, NY 10022, USA

originalText.text:
I went for my birthday and it was a once in a lifetime experience I will always cherish! Chef Guo's restaurant is a culinary masterpiece that offers a delightful journey through 19 expertly crafted courses. Each dish showcases the genius of the celebrity chef's unique culinary system, creating a symphony of flavors that captivates the senses. The intimate and ornate atmosphere adds to the charm, creating a dining experience that feels both exclusive and sophisticated.

The staff goes above and beyond to make every guest feel special, creating a welcoming and personalized experience. The presence of the celebrity chef working diligently in the kitchen, adds an extra layer of warmth and exclusivity.

From the first course to the last, the attention to detail in both presentation and taste is impeccable. The fusion of ingredients and the innovative culinary techniques result in a gastronomic adventure that is nothing short of extraordinary. You can taste his passion and experience with every bite! It was a memorable night I will hold dear!

originalText.text: The incredible dining experience. After numerous meals at Michelin-starred restaurants, I must say that ChefGuo is one of the best overall high-end restaurants I have experienced... from flawless service, meticulously prepared dishes, to the breathtaking and unique environment that immerses you in an outstanding gastronomic journey. I highly recommend 3 Michelin stars!

I highly recommend 3 Michelin stars!

originalText.text:
My review for this restaurant is awesome!!!!ü§©
As soon as I entered the restaurant I was shocked by the decorative style inside, which simply arrived at the feeling of a palace dinner. I have rarely seen some restaurants so richly decorated with Chinese cultural characteristics. For the food, I don't even dare to break its shapeü§£ü§£because the food is as exquisite as if is fake, and at first glance thought it was a painting.

Overall, the environment and the food are top-notch, at least one of the tops in my case. Compared with Michelin's three-star restaurant, I prefer Chef Guo, more to my taste.  I really really really really super recommend trying it! ü•πüòã

originalText.text:
WOW.  I had an amazing, exquisite, imperial dinner experience at Chef Guo‚Äôs midtown namesake restaurant.

The restaurant environment, reinforced that imperial feel.  I definitely felt like royalty, entering through the restaurant‚Äôs private gate, being greeted by a white gloved server.  A server who was dressed in gold trimmed, traditional, imperial Chinese outfit.

The dinner that followed was nothing short of incredible.  Exquisite, a ‚ÄúOnce in a lifetime‚Äù sort of an experience.

BTW everything on the plate is eatable, including the butterflies and the $100 bill üíµ. üò≥

originalText.text:
My experience at Chefguo was truly outstanding. This high-end traditional Chinese restaurant offers an authentic, elegant, and superb dining adventure. From the beautifully crafted dishes to the charming ambiance, everything is top-notch.

I highly recommend Chefguo for a memorable and luxurious dining experience.
